data.title: Top 10 LED Manufacturers Ranking in China (2024 Updated)
data.text:
Do you want to purchase LED lights from China?

Do you want to know what are the top LED light manufacturers in China?

We have collected the latestLED manufacturer rankings in 2024, which is convenient for choosing a Chinese LED lamp supplier that suits you.

With the continuous development of China's science and technology in recent years, China's LED products have been greatly improved. For manufacturers, the brand influence of some Chinese LED lamp manufacturers has been recognized by customers overseas, and the brand building of Chinese LED companies has achieved significant results. In the future, the influence of Chinese LED lighting companies in the international arena is bound to increase. Then this article will tell you which are the best manufacturers in China's LED lighting market.

We have listed the more famous LED manufacturers in China. The following rankings are in no particular order.

Top 10 LED Manufacturers List 1. Leboda Technology Co., Ltd.

2. Xiamen Yankon Energetic Lighting Co., Ltd

3. San'an Optoelectronics Co., Ltd

4. Xiamen Topstar Lighting Co.,Ltd

5. Xiamen Longstarlighting Co.,ltd

7. ZheJiang Klite Lighting Holdings CO.,LTD

8. FSL-Foshan Electrical And Lighting Co.,Ltd

9. Lightstec Co.,Ltd

10. Flying Lighting Co., Ltd

Locationï¼

About the Company

LEBODA LIGHTING is a professional manufacturer and exporter focusing on outdoor & industrial lightings, LED street lights, high-bay lights and floodlights etc.LEBODA has been supplying high-performance products to valuable customers from Europe, America, Australia, Africa etc., with the goal of making their works more effective and life more bright.

Lightstec as an LED lamp factory. Previously there was an LED light factory in Shenzhen. In 2013, they moved the factory to Zhongshan City. Lightstec has been optimizing the manufacturing process to provide customers with high-performance and high-quality products at a competitive price. Lightstec's LED products are produced by a skilled team and made of the highest quality materials.

About the Company

In addition to conventional street light products, Flying Lighting released a new high-tech element series products from the Chinese Academy of Sciences in 2016, and launched Flying's PLC intelligent street light system in 2017. With a strong R&D team and modern management within the enterprise , Flight Lighting successfully completed the transformation from a traditional factory to a high-tech modern manufacturer.

Conclusion

Here is the latest list of LED manufacturers in 2024 that we have collected and compiled. As the largest production base of LED manufacturers in the world, China has a lot of suppliers. You can freely choose a supplier that suits you as your long-term partner in your LED business.

At present, manufacturing plants in China and the world are very strong in terms of raw materials and supply chains. If you need to buy LED street light products, then choosing a Chinese LED manufacturer must be a good choice. If you need LED related products, you can contact us or visit our website: www.lebodaworld.com
